name: Xarxa Health
overview:
Launched in Bangalore in 2008, Xarxa Health provides the Indian medical community with a cutting-edge social network that enables Patients, Doctors, Medical Associations, Clinics and Hospitals to subscribe or connect directly with each other as well as with Medical Associations, Self-help groups, Pharmaceutical companies, Medical Device manufacturers, Medical Service providers, and other entities in the Indian healthcare ecosystem.

Xarxa Health [The Indian Healthcare Network] is dedicated to:

  1. Improving Healthcare in India by improving information dissemination mechanisms
  2. Reducing the carbon footprint of the Indian medical ecosystem
